messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright boys we're going to be doing a lot today. Hope you boys know how to work because we're gonna be workin'

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Nanotrasen Officer #122
messages.body: Due to highly erotic roleplay activity happening on your station, we've decided to put up posters opposing these acts.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, not more than 15 rodents have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: 'Cause Engineering is kinda retardo this round we gotta go.
